location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Captain Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a dispatch (not present) from William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Bombay Government, regarding measures projected for the blockade of the Bussora [Basra] river.
